channel.title: Logistics on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Logistics on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Duty-Free Loophole Is Closing. What That Means for You—and Your Packages
item.description: President Donald Trump stopped allowing small shipments to enter the country without paying tariffs. Now, things are getting pricier and shipping costs are going up.
